name: Aven Riftwatcher
oracle_text: Flying
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Aven Riftwatcher enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

name: Benalish Commander
oracle_text: Benalish Commander's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Soldiers you control.

Suspend X—{X}{W}{W}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{W}{W} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Benalish Commander while it's exiled, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: Crovax, Ascendant Hero
oracle_text: Other white creatures get +1/+1.
Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1.
Pay 2 life: Return Crovax, Ascendant Hero to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Crovax was destined for an angel's curse, but one warped timeline saw the noble redeemed.

name: Dawn Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
• Regenerate target creature.
• Counter target spell that targets you.

name: Dust Elemental
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Dust Elemental enters the battlefield, return three creatures you control to their owner's hand.

name: Ghost Tactician
oracle_text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its ethereal hand confers a lifetime of experience with combat and steel.

name: Heroes Remembered
oracle_text: You gain 20 life.

Suspend 10—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Magus of the Tabernacle
oracle_text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."
flavor_text: The Tabernacle's disciples channel the emanations from Pendrell Vale, spreading its paradoxical demand to be both worshipped and left alone.

name: Mantle of Leadership
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Pallid Mycoderm
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Pallid Mycoderm.
Remove three spore counters from Pallid Mycoderm: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Each creature you control that's a Fungus or a Saproling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Poultice Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}, {T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
flavor_text:
"Its broad claw suggests a chitinous shield, but in fact it conceals glands that secrete a remarkably swift healing agent."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Rebuff the Wicked
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor_text:
"I cannot teach you their brand of magic, but I can teach you how to defend against it."
—Tavalus, priest of Korlis

name: Retether
oracle_text: Return each Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Only creatures can be enchanted this way. (Aura cards that can't enchant a creature on the battlefield remain in your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The rifts reach into infinite time streams, bringing the divergent products of alternate pasts into the present.

name: Riftmarked Knight
oracle_text: Protection from black; flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

Suspend 3—{1}{W}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
When the last time counter is removed from Riftmarked Knight while it's exiled, create a 2/2 black Knight creature token with flanking, protection from white, and haste.

name: Saltblast
oracle_text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
flavor_text: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

name: Saltfield Recluse
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He remembers a past of light and healing. But he lives the bitter present—parching salt, scouring wind, and the withering heat of the desert.

name: Serra's Boon
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.
flavor_text:
"The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns."
—Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

name: Shade of Trokair
oracle_text: {W}: Shade of Trokair gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

oracle_text: Flying
{W}{W}{W}: Regenerate Malach of the Dawn.
flavor_text:

—Sister Betje, Miracles of the Saints

name: Mesa Enchantress

name: Revered Dead
oracle_text: {W}: Regenerate Revered Dead.
flavor_text:
"The mists coalesced into silent warriors. We charged them and broke through their lines, only to see them swirl and re-form behind us."
—Golas Mahr, black knight

name: Sinew Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.

name: Sunlance
oracle_text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
flavor_text:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
—Orim, Samite inquisitor

name: Body Double

flavor_text: Where the dead outnumbered the living, mimics scavenged faces from the fallen.

name: Braids, Conjurer Adept
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.

name: Chronozoa

Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

name: Dichotomancy

name: Dismal Failure

oracle_text: Flying

—Aznaph, greenseeker

name: Shivan Meteor
oracle_text: Shivan Meteor deals 13 damage to target creature.

name: Stingscourger
oracle_text: Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: Sulfur Elemental
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
White creatures get +1/-1.

name: Timecrafting
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Remove X time counters from target permanent or suspended card.
• Put X time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.
flavor_text: Oddly, an unstable time stream makes wizards want to tinker with it even more.

name: Torchling
oracle_text: {R}: Untap Torchling.
{R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able.

{1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

oracle_text: Volcano Hellion has echo {X}, where X is your life total. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

name: Bust (Boom/Bust)
oracle_text: Destroy all lands.

name: Boom (Boom/Bust)

name: Gone (Dead/Gone)
oracle_text: Return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand.

name: Rough (Rough/Tumble)
oracle_text: Rough deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

name: Tumble (Rough/Tumble)
oracle_text: Tumble deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Blood Knight
oracle_text: First strike, protection from white
flavor_text: His is the fury of the wildfire, the boiling blood of the volcano. He fights you not because you've wronged him, but because you're there.

name: Brute Force
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

name: Molten Firebird
oracle_text: Flying
When Molten Firebird dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step.
{4}{R}: Exile Molten Firebird.

name: Prodigal Pyromancer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"Learn to burn!"
—Institute of Arcane Studies motto

name: Pyrohemia
oracle_text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pyrohemia.
{R}: Pyrohemia deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Reckless Wurm
oracle_text: Trample
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

name: Shivan Wumpus
oracle_text: Trample
When Shivan Wumpus enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Shivan Wumpus on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: It's easier to move the village than to divert the wumpus.

name: Simian Spirit Guide
oracle_text: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R} to your mana pool.
flavor_text:
"All my spells smell like burnt hair lately."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Skirk Shaman
oracle_text: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
flavor_text: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

name: Ana Battlemage
oracle_text: Kicker {2}{U} and/or {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} and/or {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)
When Ana Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, target player discards three cards.
When Ana Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, tap target untapped creature and that creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

name: Citanul Woodreaders
oracle_text: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.
flavor_text: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

name: Deadwood Treefolk
oracle_text: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

oracle_text: Choose one —
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Kavu Predator
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.
flavor_text: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

name: Life and Limb
oracle_text: All Forests and all Saprolings are 1/1 green Saproling creatures and Forest lands in addition to their other types.

"It was a sight of pain and awe—a twisted forest, migrating across the salt plain in search of richer soil."
—Edahlis, greenseeker

name: Magus of the Library

{T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

name: Mire Boa
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{G}: Regenerate Mire Boa.
flavor_text: Mire slime courses through its veins in place of blood. No sooner does it bleed than it opens its mouth to replace the loss.

name: Pouncing Wurm
oracle_text: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)

name: Sophic Centaur
oracle_text: {2}{G}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

name: Timbermare

name: Uktabi Drake

name: Wild Pair

name: Essence Warden

"The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Fa'adiyah Seer
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.
flavor_text: "My visions don't show me home. They show me where home is yet to be found."

name: Gaea's Anthem
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text:
"To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

name: Groundbreaker
oracle_text: Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Groundbreaker.
flavor_text: The earth's memory is long, its retribution brief.

name: Harmonize
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Healing Leaves

• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor_text: The elves of Llanowar don't trust in alchemy. They rely instead on pure herbs harvested from the forest's sacred heart.

name: Hedge Troll
oracle_text: Hedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
{W}: Regenerate Hedge Troll.
flavor_text: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.

name: Keen Sense
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Crovax sensed that Mirri wasn't ready for the curse taking hold of her. Weeping in his heart, he fled.

name: Seal of Primordium
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:

name: Darkheart Sliver

"At first we thought we were in some haunted wood. Then the branches twisted and scuttled toward us."
—Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

"It triggers the hive's period of Ætheric fertility—a time when even feeding is a lower priority than reproduction."

name: Frenetic Sliver

oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Intet, the Dreamer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as Intet remains on the battlefield.

name: Necrotic Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{3}, Sacrifice this permanent: Destroy target permanent."
flavor_text: Though Volrath is long dead, the slivers have become everything he wanted them to be: mindless instruments of destruction and despair.

name: Numot, the Devastator
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Numot, the Devastator deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, destroy up to two target lands.

name: Oros, the Avenger

name: Radha, Heir to Keld
oracle_text: Whenever Radha, Heir to Keld attacks, you may add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: "Run home, cur. I've already taken your master's head. Don't make me thrash you with it."

name: Teneb, the Harvester
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Teneb, the Harvester deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Vorosh, the Hunter

Whenever Vorosh, the Hunter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put six +1/+1 counters on Vorosh.

name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth

"Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse."
